name: from
description: Casts an <%= type 'Entity' %>-based type to be a (non-scripted) <%= lua_class_name %> instead.
_Exception: If it is already a <%= doc_class_name %>, it is returned as a <%= doc_class_name %> object instead._

parameters.name: entity
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Entity' %> you want to cast to a <%= doc_class_name %>.
